column1: Today I am proud to annouce the Tesla D, the most innovative and efficient world-friendly mode of transportation ever created. Any questions?
I am so sick of hearing about app-based ride-sharing! The future of transportation is the electric cars, not wheelchairs!
If there is a way to reduce Handicar's positive publicity, then we need to do it now!  And you! You say it's theoretically possible?
But I though we wanted Handicar to lose the race!
